```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, messages = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(readr)
library(sf)
```

```{r}
mean_ocean_temp <- read.csv("Data/meanoceantemp.csv", header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
salinity <- read.csv("Data/salinity2.csv", header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
totalphytoplankton <- read.csv("Data/totalphytoplankton.csv", header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ph <- read.csv("Data/ph.csv", header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
chlorophyll <- read.csv("Data/chlorophyll.csv", header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
Mixed_Layer_Depth<-read.csv("Data/MixedLayerDepth.csv", header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
manta_complete <- read.csv("Data/manta_complete.csv") 
#manta_complete %>% 
  #slice(1:19485)
#st_as_sf(model_data)
```


```{r}
combined_data <- cbind(mean_ocean_temp, Mixed_Layer_Depth, salinity, totalphytoplankton, ph, chlorophyll, manta_complete)
```
